original_text: As for the other events of Hezekiah’s reign, all his achievements and how he made the pool and the tunnel by which he brought water into the city, are they not written in the book of the annals of the kings of Judah?
korean_text: 히스기야의 남은 사적과 그의 모든 업적과 저수지와 수도를 만들어 물을 성 안으로 끌어들인 일은 유다 왕 역대지략에 기록되지 아니하였느냐

sentences.original_text: As for the other events of Hezekiah's reign
and how he made the pool and the tunnel
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그가 어떻게 못과 터널을 만들었는지

sentences.original_text: by which he brought water into the city
sentences.korean_translation: 그것을 통해 그가 도시로 물을 들였던

sentences.original_text: are they not written in the book of the annals
